title: Ghosthunting - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/14/18
itunes:title: Ghosthunting - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/14/18
description:
George Noory and paranormal investigator Ted Vanson discuss his career as a ghosthunter, the tools he uses for his investigations and whether ghosthunting has become more popular in recent years.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
